description: This file defines a Qwik component for a TODO list application, including loader and action handlers for managing list state, and renders the UI for adding and displaying list items.

classes.name: ListItem
classes.description: Interface representing an item in the to-do list, containing a 'text' field.

methods.name: useListLoader
methods.description: Loader function to retrieve the current list of TODO items.

methods.name: useAddToListAction
methods.description: Action handler to add a new item to the TODO list with input validation.
